name: Metroidvania Month 16 entry test
description:
Here's my prototype for the GameJam. Had a lot of fun making the pixelart and a lot of confusion figuring out the coding. All in all, quite an enjoyable experience I sure once again learned a lot from!

That's the first project I feel like I could call somewhat acceptable at least in its prototype phase. I might work on it further, though I sure need a break first after it fell apart x times during transfer from Unity to Itch.
